titleStmt.title: The Christian nauy VVherein is playnely described the perfit course to sayle to the hauen of eternall happinesse. VVritten by Anthony Nixon.
Shippe of safegarde
titleStmt.author: Googe, Barnabe, 1540-1594.
Nixon, Anthony.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Simon Stafford, dwelling in Hosier lane, neere Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: A plagiarism of: Googe, Barnabe. The shippe of safegarde.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
